channel.title: CVE Feed for Codeboxr Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Codeboxr Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-51514|2024-02-01T11:17:19.614Z -- codeboxr%20team -- cbx%20bookmark%20%26%20favorite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Codeboxr Team CBX Bookmark & Favorite allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CBX Bookmark & Favorite: from n/a through 1.7.13.

item.title: CVE-2024-32577|2024-06-04T17:51:51.610Z -- codeboxr%20team -- cbx%20bookmark%20%26%20favorite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Codeboxr Team CBX Bookmark & Favorite cbxwpbookmark allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CBX Bookmark & Favorite: from n/a through 1.7.20.

item.title: CVE-2024-32132|2024-06-04T17:50:15.990Z -- codeboxr%20team -- cbx%20bookmark%20%26%20favorite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Codeboxr Team CBX Bookmark & Favorite.This issue affects CBX Bookmark & Favorite: from n/a through 1.7.20.
